forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 31. West wind around 14 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 41, with temperatures falling to around 35 in the afternoon. West wind 13 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 37 mph.

weather_report:
In the hushed hours of the early morning, Boston is cloaked in a blanket of clouds, the air brisk with the promise of change. The temperature rests at a nippy 31 degrees, a harbinger of the near-future where the sun will break through. As the day unfurls, the clouds are expected to disperse, revealing a mostly sunny disposition, although the afternoon will invite a gradual descent into cooler territory, settling at around 35 degrees. A strong breeze dances through the city, with gusts that remind one of a brisk New England winter, where winds of 21 mph brush past with playful insistence.

As you step outside, a coat with a sturdy lining will be your faithful companion against the chill. Layering up is advisable to embrace the evolving temperatures of the day. Although the skies promise patches of blue, don’t be surprised if shadows linger, lending the day an invigorating edge. This is a day for solitary walks through the quieter streets, perhaps indulging in a warm coffee from a local café, or meandering along the waterfront to witness the majestic interplay between sea and sky, flushing with color as the daylight unfolds. The chill may deter longer outdoor pursuits, but for those seeking serenity, a stroll amidst Boston’s historic architecture will surely nourish the soul, as the city wakes and stirs slowly from its night-time slumber.
